attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: give the VOTERS of the united kingdom,a referendum on all immigration into our uk,to see if we want it stopped or continued,also a referendum on wether all illegal immigrants and escaped bogus asylum seekers should be immediately deported on capture or given amnesty and leave to stay in the uk.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
